name: CryENGINE Character Parameters File
summary: Learn about .CHRPARAMS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: As of CryENGINE 3.3, the CHRPARAMS format replaces the use of .CAL, .IK, and .SETUP files. The information from these three file types is now consolidated into the CHRPARAMS format.

description: File created with the CryENGINE SDK, a program suite used for building 3D games; contains references to the character animation files (.CAF) as well as information about animation events for the character that can be invoked when programming the game.
